mapper.select: select a.seq as io_seq, a.ioQuantity, a.acOrder_seq, a.grocery_seq, b.seq as ac_seq, c.seq as gc_seq, c.gcName, c.gcPrice, c.gcPrice * a.ioQuantity as totalPrice from individualOrder as a left join acOrder as b on b.seq = a.acOrder_seq left join grocery as c on c.seq = a.grocery_seq where 1=1 AND acOrder_seq = #{ac_seq}
